articles.author: THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
articles.title: From Beyoncé to Lady Gaga, who else sang the national anthem at presidential inaugurations? - The Associated Press
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump has selected opera tenor Christopher Macchio to perform the national anthem at his second inauguration. Carrie Underwood will also perform “America the Beautiful” on Monday. Recently, pop stars including Beyoncé and Lady Gaga have…
articles.content: President-elect Donald Trump selected opera tenor Christopher Macchio to perform the national anthem at Mondays inauguration, at which Carrie Underwood will also perform America the Beautiful. Heres … [+1733 chars]
